name: Engine Thrust 1
description:
We created an open world car game, but its not a complete game in any regard, we are trying get a game out so that we can work on its second installment, simply by avoiding getting stuck on a single game.

We truly apologize though we are truly happy that we finally get to release it because those 3D models took a long while to make and stay in touch for our upcoming FPS Survival game.

Thank you for your support.

We LOVE you all.
